properties.abstract: The region around Unteriberg is best known under the name Hoch-Ybrig. The skiing industry with its installations has occupied and in part blemished the majority of the gently ascending pastures. However, the two summits Forstberg and Druesberg have so far escaped the ballyhoo. Alpine hikers even profit from the installations. From Chli Stärnen, summit station of a chairlift, the two summits can be traversed on interesting itineraries offering a lot of splendid views.
properties.subtitle: Hoch-Ybrig off the ski runs and lifts
properties.title: Sternen - Forstberg - Druesberg – Weglosen

sac_photos.title: Forstberg, above the grassy ridge is Sternen

segments.description: The white-blue-white marked route begins at the summit station of the Sternen chairlift and at first leads up to the ridge and to Gross Sternen. From there hike to Tisch, occasionally on a slippery or narrow trail, but always with a splendid view. Continue to P. 2010 and down into the depression. Now the grass ends and scree and rubble begin.
segments.gpx_pois: {"type":"FeatureCollection","features":[{"type":"Feature","geometry":{"type":"Point","coordinates":[2704861.745495437,1206559.7872245598]},"properties":{"name":"Beginn Ketten vor P.2033"}},{"type":"Feature","geometry":{"type":"Point","coordinates":[2705689.745497559,1206619.787224426]},"properties":{"name":"Senke zwischen Forstberg und Druesberg"}}]}

photos.caption: The grassy ridge to Gross Sternen and Forstberg

segments.title: Chli Stärnen - outcrop Forstberg

segments.description: The rock gets more compact. Helped by chains, scramble over the crux of the tour, a rocky outcrop, to reach P. 2033 through a gully. Once past that passage, you arrive at the summit cross of Forstberg in pastures and without any difficulty.

photos.caption: The crux in the outcrop to Forstberg

segments.title: Outcrop Forstberg - Forstberg summit

segments.description: On a faint path on brittle rock descend north-eastward below a prominent rock formation to the saddle between Forstberg and Druesberg. On the subsequent ascent in the pasture you need to overcome, helped by chains, a 15 m high schrofen belt. Now the good trail makes a curve to the left to reach the Druesberg summit.
segments.title: Forstberg - Druesberg

segments.description: On the same route go back to the saddle between Forstberg and Druesberg. Turn downvalley to reach P. 1911 on an unproblematic talus. Now hike northward in pastures to Druesberghütte (1582 m).
segments.title: Druesberg - Druesberghütte

segments.description: From Druesberghütte follow the trail zigzagging in the meadows to Gruebi, where at the signpost in front of the little hut the Leiterenweg branches off towards Weglosen.

photos.caption: Beginning of the Leiterenweg at Gruebi

segments.title: Druesberghütte - Gruebi

segments.description: The trail to the ladders has been upgraded by wooden stairs and steel cables. It leads through the impressive rocky landscape. Occasionally it is rather steep and at the end it leads out on a balcony. From there, an 8 m high, almost vertical metallic ladder goes down to the ditch of a creek, which is negotiated with the help of a chain. Again on wooden stairs hike down through the steep forest via P. 1117 to Weglosen.

photos.caption: The fixed ladder goes directly down to the creek bed.

segments.title: Gruebi - Weglosen
